documentation: # MailerLite This guide will walk you through the steps to integrate MailerLite into Boltic. ## Prerequisites Before integrating MailerLite with Boltic, ensure you have: - A MailerLite account - The MailerLite API Key ## Setting Up the MailerLite Integration in Boltic 1. **Log In** - Log into your MailerLite account. 2. **Obtain API Key** - Navigate to **Account Settings**. - Select **Integrations** from the left-hand menu. - Under the **Developer API** section, find your API Key or click **Generate new API Key**. - Copy the API Key to use in Boltic. 3. **Log into Boltic** - Log into your Boltic account and access the Boltic dashboard. 4. **Navigate to Integrations** - Click on `Sources` in the dashboard and then click on `+ Add New Source`. 5. **Select Source Type** - On the “Set up the source” page, search for `MailerLite` from the search bar and select it. 6. **Configure Integration** - **Name:** Provide a name for the MailerLite integration. - **API Key:** Paste the API Key copied from MailerLite. 7. **Details (Optional)** - **Tags:** Add tags for organizing the integration. - **Description:** Include a brief description of the MailerLite integration. 8. **Test and Save Integration** - Click `Test Connection` to verify the API key and ensure the connection is successful. - Once the connection is confirmed, click `Set up source` to finalize the configuration. ## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. **Where do I find my MailerLite API Key?** - You can find your API Key under **Account Settings** > **Integrations** > **Developer API** in your MailerLite account. 2. **What should I do if my connection fails?** - Ensure the API Key is correctly copied from MailerLite. - Check your network or firewall settings to allow external connections. 3. **How frequently is data synced?** - Data sync frequency is determined by the sync settings you configure during setup. 4. **Can I customize the data being synced?** - Yes, you can customize the data being synced based on your integration requirements. ## Support If you need further assistance, please contact Boltic support or visit our Support Documentation.
